page.title: 16Employment/Tourism-Mousehole
page.content: Many of the people who live in {Mousehole}leave the village each day to go to work. Work in the village itself is mainly on the service industries such as plumbing, painters and decorators, electricians and suchlike. Also there are the shopkeepers, publicans, hoteliers and cafe owners who employ others to serve the local community and, especially in the summer, the visitors. There is what amounts to a small artists colony in{Mousehole}and much of their work is displayed for sale to the summer visitors. {Lamorna}also has quite a large number of artists who also display their work in studios for sale to the visitors and local people. There are potteries at both{Lamorna and{Mousehole}and at the one named the {Lamorna Pottery}anyone can pay to try their hand at throwing a pot.
